headline: Claude Code Challenges IBM Legacy Business As Valuation Discount Widens
summary: Anthropic launched Claude Code, an AI tool aimed at automating modernization of COBOL on mainframes, raising questions about IBM’s legacy consulting and modernization work. The development has sparked concerns over potential disruption to International Business Machines' core services in mainframe and legacy systems. IBM has responded by leaning on its existing AI roadmap, deepening partnerships, and highlighting recent federal contracts and operational successes. For you as an investor,...
